title.narrative: Increase capacity and resilience of poor people Local Economic Development

description.narrative: Local Econ. Development-OCAM, MUNDUKIDE & TEAGASC,Order o f Professional Accountants o f Mozambique (OCAM): Strengthening Accountancy and Audit in Mozambique; Mundukide: support Family Sector Food Security and income through agriculture programme based in Niassa province. TEAGASC: reasearch partnership between Teagasc and the Instituto de Investigacao Agraria de Mocambique (IIAM)

OCAM: With Technical Assistance from CPA Ireland, Establish the order in Mozambique, The twinning arrangement provides technical assistance, training, and goods to the OCAM to enable it to function as a modem professional accountancy body as well as strengthen their capacity to join the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC); Mundukide: The primary objectives of Mundukide is to develop two nucleus of inclusive peasant development, one in Cabo Delgado and another in Niassa. In each nucleus the objective would be to support approximately 25,000 peasant households (20% of all peasant families in the districts concerned) earning an annual income equivalent to the minimum wage (40.000.00 MZM). TEAGASC: Identification of areas of commom interest in the areas of Agriculturein support to small holder farmers. Initial area identifies is dairy milk.
